subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Sherman, the Seattle Seahawks cornerback, was asked about his tirade after the N.F.C. championship game, but this being media day, he was asked some other questions, too.
snippet: Sherman, the Seattle Seahawks cornerback, was asked about his tirade after the N.F.C. championship game, but this being media day, he was asked some other questions, too.
